name: Paradox (itch) (Lambdanaut)
description:
Work with your past self to get through a dungeon in this time loop puzzle game.

Your past self will lag behind you in a time loop by 8 turns. Use this to your advantage to navigate the puzzles and traverse deeper into the mysterious facility Gerlache.

Controls
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Confirm text: Z or X
  • Restart Level: Escape
